destinations.title: Luminara Tides
destinations.description: Immerse yourself in bioluminescent waters where marine life glows with ethereal light.
destinations.longDescription: Immerse yourself in bioluminescent waters where marine life glows with ethereal light. This enchanting ocean world offers pristine beaches and cosmic-inspired tranquility beneath twin moons. Experience the wonder of nocturnal marine ecosystems and crystalline shores.

destinations.title: Crystalline Canyons
destinations.description: Venture through stunning crystal formations that catch and refract light into a thousand colors.
destinations.longDescription: Venture through stunning crystal formations that catch and refract light into a thousand colors. Explore ancient geological formations and experience the majesty of crystalline landscapes. Witness nature's most spectacular light shows reflected through mineral-rich canyon walls.

destinations.title: Nebula Nexus Station
destinations.description: Experience luxury at the edge of known space with unparalleled nebula views.
destinations.longDescription: Experience luxury at the edge of known space. This orbital station offers unparalleled views of swirling nebula clouds and serves as the ultimate destination for cosmic adventurers. Fine dining, zero-gravity experiences, and stellar observation decks await.

destinations.title: Aurora Peak Paradise
destinations.description: Witness the mesmerizing dance of auroras above ice-capped peaks.
destinations.longDescription: Witness the mesmerizing dance of auroras above ice-capped peaks. A winter wonderland where the sky blazes with cosmic colors and pristine snow blankets the landscape. Aurora hunting expeditions, ice hotels, and thermal hot springs provide unforgettable experiences.

destinations.title: Verdant Moon Sanctuary
destinations.description: Discover lush jungle valleys blessed with bioluminescent flora and pristine ecosystems.
destinations.longDescription: Discover lush jungle valleys blessed with bioluminescent flora and pristine ecosystems. A haven for nature lovers and wildlife enthusiasts seeking connection with thriving alien biospheres. Guided jungle treks, wildlife observation, and conservation programs.
